definition: Yan, a vassal state of Zhou in modern Hebei and Liaoning/north Hebei/the four Yan kingdoms of the Sixteen Kingdoms, namely: Former Yan 前燕 (337-370), Later Yan 後燕|后燕 (384-409), Southern Yan 南燕 (398-410), Northern Yan 北燕 (409-436)/surname Yan

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
the swallow's nest is built one beakful of mud at a time (idiom)/many a little makes a mickle
pinyin: yan4 zi5 xian2 ni2 lei3 da4 wo1

sentences.english: In the hall, the shallow challenger shall be allowed to swallow the swallows.
sentences.chinese: 在大廳裏，浮淺得挑釁者將被容許吞下燕子。

sentences.english: The swallows go south in winter.
He dreamed a black swan and several swallows flying in the sky.
sentences.chinese: 他夢見一隻黑天鵝和幾隻燕子在空中飛翔。

sentences.english: Thee swallow twittering from the straw-built shed.
sentences.chinese: 茅草棚上燕子的細語呢喃。

sentences.english: One day the swallow noticed that there were no more leaves to be picked.
sentences.chinese: 有一天，燕子發現金葉全都被剝完了。

sentences.english: Every spring swallows fly back to the north.
sentences.chinese: 燕子每個春天都飛回北方。

sentences.english: Like a fluttering sparrow or a darting swallow, an undeserved curse does not come to rest.
sentences.chinese: 麻雀往來，燕子翻飛，這樣，無故的咒詛也必不臨到。

sentences.english: Jiang, Swallow worry fans the right month, the cuckoo Luoyang smoke break.
sentences.chinese: 燕子愁迷江右月，杜鵑聲破洛陽煙。

sentences.english: The seven swallows were set free at Croydon .
sentences.chinese: 這七隻燕子在克洛頓被釋放。

sentences.english: In Xiaojian leadership, swallow and others entering the fugitive.
sentences.chinese: 在簫劍的領導下，小燕子等人一起邁入亡命天涯之途。

sentences.english: In the hall the shallow challenger shall be allowed to swallow the swallows.
sentences.chinese: 在大廳俚膚淺的挑戰者將被允許吞下燕子。

sentences.english: In fact, Golden Sparrow is a good example of a "Sparrow Monkey".
sentences.chinese: 事實上，金燕子是一個好例子，去“麻雀猴子”。

sentences.english: The returning of the swallows are the heralds of the spring.
sentences.chinese: 燕子歸來預示着春天的來臨。

sentences.english: Swallows come by group at the advent of spring.
sentences.chinese: 春天來臨時燕子成羣飛來。

definition: (bird species of China) barn swallow (Hirundo rustica)
bird/CL:隻|只[zhi1],群[qun2]/(dialect) to pay attention to/(intensifier) damned/goddam
(bird species of China) little egret (Egretta garzetta)
